thi-ap32:3.1: 2 Caturāsītibhikkhunīsahassaapadāna → brāhmaṇakaññābhikkhunīnaṃ apadānaṃ (bj) | cuturāsītisahassabrāhmaṇakaññātherīnamapadānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | caturāsītiṃ brāhmaṇakaññā bhikkhunī sahassāni apadānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap32:28.3: Tassa setuṃ vihārañca → tassa setuvihāre ca (bj) | tesu setuvihāresu (si) | tassa setū vihāre ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap32:39.2: kittiñca sakkataṃ → kittisukhaṃ piyaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | kittitasakkatā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap32:43.4: vītarāgā bhavāmase → natthi dāni punabbhavo (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
